channel.description: Recent content in Uml on CyrusN

item.title: UML Notes
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Usecase Include and Extend uml - What’s is the difference between include and extend in use case diagram? - Stack Overflow Example Amazon Application Use Case Diagram Creole in notes notes in plantuml support Creole language Creole (markup) - Wikiwand Links UML 2.0 Tutorial - YouTube Unified Modeling Language (UML) description, UML diagram examples, tutorials and reference for all types of UML diagrams - use case diagrams, class, package, component, composite structure diagrams, deployments, activities, interactions, profiles, etc.

item.title: Draw More Work Less
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Some Links UML | leesei’s notebook Draw More, Work Less | [self employed] Draw More, Work Less PlantUML Mermaid from leesei Unified Modeling Language (UML) Business Process Model and Notation (BPMN) is very similar to activity diagram. YANG Central Allen Holub’s UML Quick Reference Text based tools I used to use the GUI tool Dia. But it was very buggy and no longer updated. I then went on to look for alternatives.
